focus.title: Research Focus
focus.value: Closed-loop Evaluation and Testability of End-to-End Autonomous Driving

strength.title: Strength
strength.value: From Research to Engineering (Reproducible Pipeline + Diagnostics)

about.title: About Me
paras: I am an undergraduate student in Computer Science at SUSTech with a solid foundation in programming, data structures, algorithms, and software engineering.

I have a strong interest in AI (NLP, deep learning, reinforcement learning) and autonomous driving (end-to-end architectures and closed-loop testing), and enjoy turning research ideas into engineering systems.
I value teamwork and continuous learning, and aim to strengthen independent problem-solving and collaborative research capabilities.
highlights: Improve multilingual communication, academic writing, and teamwork skills.
Deepen knowledge in AI and autonomous driving, and actively participate in frontier research projects.
Plan to pursue graduate studies domestically or abroad to further develop academic and research capabilities.

research.title: Research
research.cardTitle: End-to-End Autonomous Driving and Closed-Loop Testing
research.meta: Advisors: Qi Hao (Academic Advisor), Gongjin Lan | Team Members: Yi Xu, Xun Zhao, Wentao Luo
bullets: Study closed-loop evaluation paradigms and testability of end-to-end autonomous driving models
Build a CARLA-based closed-loop testing pipeline enabling continuous perception–decision–action–feedback
Implement real-time execution and diagnostic logging to capture behavioral signals beyond open-loop metrics
Analyze failure modes such as error accumulation, state drift, and control instability

tech.title: Programming Languages & Tools
items: Java, C, C++, Python, MATLAB: solid programming and project development skills.
Git, GitHub: familiar with repository creation, commits, maintenance, and collaboration workflows.
LaTeX, Markdown: capable of academic writing and document typesetting.
Windows, Linux, macOS, CARLA: proficient in operating systems and simulation environments.

others.title: Other Skills
items: Strong teamwork: able to integrate quickly into teams and collaborate efficiently on complex projects.
Organization and communication: capable of coordinating meetings and clearly expressing requirements.
Multilingual communication: able to work in Chinese, English, and Japanese environments.
Support-oriented mindset: able to provide emotional and logistical support under high-pressure situations.
